Class StockMarketModelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.StockMarketModelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStockMarketModel

    public class StockMarketModelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStockMarketModel
    The class StockMarketModelImpl which implements the interface IStockMarketModel. It has overridden methods like buyStock, viewComposition, createPortfolio, evaluatePortfolio and calculateCostBasis.
